attributes.additional_details:
CHANGES TO CHILDREN CENTRE SERVICES AT CAMROSE

Camrose sure start centre has been informed that Northamptonshire county council has chosen another provider who will mange YOUR children centre services in the camrose / kingsheath/ rye hill area from the 1st august 2014

This will affect the services that you access at the moment!
MOST importantly it will affect the care your child and yourself receive from them across the centre

camrose does not know the extent of the changes ahead but they will be coming and they will (you) will be affected.

there is a meeting on the 19th june at 10.30 am at the county hall opposite All saints church

if you want to ask why and let your Councillors know that you are concerned about that please come along from 9.15 am
flags banners are welcome please come along
